mapper.sql: id, vip_code as vipCode, vip_type as vipType, indate, vip_state as vipState
mapper.insert:
insert into t_vip_codes (id, vip_code, vip_type, indate, vip_state) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.vipCode}, #{item.vipType}, #{item.indate}, #{item.vipState})
mapper.update:
update t_vip_codes
vip_code = #{vipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vip_type = #{vipType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
indate = #{indate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vip_state = #{vipState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from t_vip_codes where vip_type = #{vipType} and vip_state = #{vipState} and merchant_id = #{merchantId} limit #{limit} , 1
select count(1) from t_vip_codes where vip_type = #{vipType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and merchant_id = #{merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and vip_state = 1
